mapper.select: select ep.*,eo.organization_name org,ebd.base_data_name post from ehr_person ep left join ehr_organization eo on ep.organization_id=eo.organization_id left join ehr_base_data ebd on ep.post_id=ebd.base_data_id where ep.organization_id = #{organizationId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and ep.is_deleted=0 ${@com.jabava.utils.privilege.AuthorisedPersonUtil@getUserAuthorisedPersonList("ep.person_id")}

select ep.* from ehr_person ep left join ehr_organization eo on ep.organization_id=eo.organization_id where ep.is_deleted=0 and ep.organization_id in
#{item}

select count(*) from ehr_person where company_id= #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_deleted=0
and organization_id in (select organization_id from ehr_organization where total_organization_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{distinguish, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%'))
and status=0 ${where} ${@com.jabava.utils.privilege.AuthorisedPersonUtil@getUserAuthorisedPersonList("person_id")} ORDER BY person_id DESC

select count(*) from ehr_person where company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_deleted=0
and organization_id in (select organization_id from ehr_organization where total_organization_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{distinguish, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%'))
and status=0 ${where} ${@com.jabava.utils.privilege.AuthorisedPersonUtil@getUserAuthorisedPersonList("person_id")} order by person_id desc

select ep.person_id,ep.job_number,ep.employee_name,ep.mobile,ep.Email, DATE_FORMAT(ep.birth_date, '%Y-%m-%d')birthDate1,eo.organization_name org,ebd.base_data_name post from ehr_person ep left join ehr_organization eo on ep.organization_id=eo.organization_id left join ehr_base_data ebd on ep.post_id=ebd.base_data_id where ep.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and ep.is_deleted=0
and ep.organization_id in (select organization_id from ehr_organization where total_organization_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{distinguish, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%'))
and ep.status=0 ${where} ${@com.jabava.utils.privilege.AuthorisedPersonUtil@getUserAuthorisedPersonList("ep.person_id")} order by ep.person_id desc

select ep.person_id,ep.job_number,ep.employee_name,ep.mobile,ep.Email, DATE_FORMAT(ep.positive_date, '%Y-%m-%d')positiveDate1,eo.organization_name org,ebd.base_data_name post from ehr_person ep left join ehr_organization eo on ep.organization_id=eo.organization_id left join ehr_base_data ebd on ep.post_id=ebd.base_data_id where ep.company_id= #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and ep.is_deleted=0
and ep.organization_id in (select organization_id from ehr_organization where total_organization_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{distinguish, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%'))
and ep.status=0 ${where} ${@com.jabava.utils.privilege.AuthorisedPersonUtil@getUserAuthorisedPersonList("ep.person_id")} ORDER BY ep.person_id DESC
mapper.update: update ehr_person set is_deleted=#{personId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where person_id = #{personId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ${@com.jabava.utils.privilege.AuthorisedPersonUtil@getUserAuthorisedPersonList("person_id")}
mapper.select: select user_person_power_id as userPersonPowerId, user_id as userId, field_id as fieldId, seq_no as seqNo, field_type as fieldType, operate_type as operateType, field_value as fieldValue, function_point_code as functionPointCode from ehr_user_business_power where user_id=#{userId, jdbcType=BIGINT} and function_point_code=#{functionId, jdbcType=INTEGER} order by seq_no
select field_id as fieldId, field_name as fieldName, field_desc as fieldDesc, field_type as fieldType, relate_sql as relateSql from ehr_person_field where field_id=#{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}

select user_person_power_value as userPersonPowerValue, user_person_power_id as userPersonPowerId, field_id as fieldId, field_key as fieldKey, field_value as fieldValue from ehr_user_person_power_value where user_person_power_id=#{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}
select base_data_id as baseDataId,base_data_name as baseDataName from ehr_base_data where base_data_type = 5
select user_id from ehr_user_person where person_id=#{personId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into ehr_user_person(user_id,person_id) values(#{userId, jdbcType=BIGINT},#{personId, jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: select person_id, cert_id , job_number from ehr_person where company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_deleted = 0
select p.*, o.organization_name org from ehr_person p left join ehr_organization o on p.organization_id=o.organization_id where p.company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and p.is_deleted = 0
mapper.update: update ehr_person set is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIGINT} where person_id=#{personId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ${@com.jabava.utils.privilege.AuthorisedPersonUtil@getUserAuthorisedPersonList("person_id")}
mapper.select: select from ehr_person where person_id = #{personId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_deleted=0
select * from ehr_person where is_deleted = 0 and company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and job_number=#{jobNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from ehr_person where is_deleted = 0 and company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and cert_id=#{certId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select person_id from ehr_user_person where user_id= #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT ehr_person.*, ehr_company.company_name, ehr_company.contactor, ehr_company.contactor_telephone, (SELECT ehr_user.user_name FROM ehr_user WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND company_id = ehr_person.company_id AND user_type = 2 and mobile is not null and mobile <>'' ORDER BY user_id ASC limit 1) as user_name, (SELECT ehr_user.mobile as user_mobile FROM ehr_user WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND company_id = ehr_person.company_id AND user_type = 2 and mobile is not null and mobile<>'' ORDER BY user_id ASC limit 1) as user_mobile FROM ehr_person LEFT JOIN ehr_company on ehr_person.company_id = ehr_company.company_id WHERE ehr_person.is_deleted = 0 AND ehr_person.STATUS = 0 AND ehr_person.mobile IS NOT NULL

SELECT ehr_person.employee_name as userName, ehr_person.sex as sex ,ehr_company.company_name as companyName, ehr_base_data.base_data_name as positionName, ehr_person.mobile as mobile ,ehr_person.Email as mail, ehr_organization.organization_name as department FROM ehr_person LEFT JOIN ehr_company on ehr_person.company_id = ehr_company.company_id LEFT JOIN ehr_organization on ehr_person.organization_id = ehr_organization.organization_id LEFT JOIN ehr_base_data on ehr_person.post_id = ehr_base_data.base_data_id where ehr_person.is_deleted=0 and ehr_person.cert_id=#{carId} order by ehr_person.create_date desc limit 1
select * from ehr_person where is_deleted = 0 and cert_id=#{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by create_date desc limit 1

select * from ehr_person where company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and ( job_number like CONCAT('%', #{search,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or employee_name like CONCAT('%', #{search,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or cert_id like CONCAT('%', #{search,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') ) ${@com.jabava.utils.privilege.AuthorisedPersonUtil@getUserAuthorisedPersonList("person_id")}

select count(person_id) from ehr_person where is_deleted = 0 and mobile=#{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select count(person_id) from ehr_person where cert_id = #{certId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_deleted = 0 and company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select person.person_id personId,person.employee_name employeeName,person.mobile mobile,org.organization_name organizationName,person.post_id postId from ehr_person person
LEFT JOIN ehr_organization org on org.organization_id=person.organization_id
where person_id=#{personId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and person.is_deleted=0
